https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/749ttCpu2zIF56L01OgaQuAitqs.jpg An unlikely duo, Lieutenant Tom Royko of the Seattle Bomb Squad and renowned heart surgeon, Dr. Gillian Hayes, find themselves in a race against time to track down a disturbed bomber who is inexplicably causing Dr. Hayes' patients to explode. Dead in a Heartbeat
